answers.answer: "....does anyone else feel really sick on anti-biotics?"A couple of side effects of Cefuroxime Axetil are nausea and vomiting. Lots of people do not accept nor tolerate certain medications well. Tell your doctor how CA is affecting your well being. If you're taking antibiotics because of an infection its best that you change to another med immediately not stop altogether as you can worsen the infection.

question: I take two 500mg tabs of metformin daily my question is does anyone else feel really sick on anti-biotics? I have to take a 14 day course of Cefuroxime Axetil Its making very sick, so did Augmentin (I stopped taking that one after three days) I thought maybe it was because of my diabetes
title: anti-biotics make me so ill
